Crucible Signups

Reign of Iron online Crucible signups

Become legend in the Crucible with your fellow Iron Guardians. Brigade signups are accessible only to Iron Brigadiers with a focus on Trials and Ranked, but open signups are available to all. If you need to edit your availability, please contact @kuro in the clan Discord.

Reign of Iron operates in Pacific Time
